snippet: The document, which won overwhelming approval Sunday, would be the country’s 20th Constitution in 84 years. It aims to reduce the power of political parties and extend the influence of the military....
abstract: Thai voters overwhelmingly approve new Constitution proposed by country's military government aiming to reduce power of political parties and increase power of military; Constitution is country's 20th in 84 years.
lead_paragraph: The document, which won overwhelming approval Sunday, would be the country’s 20th Constitution in 84 years. It aims to reduce the power of political parties and extend the influence of the military.

headline.main: Voters in Thailand Endorse Military’s Proposed Constitution
headline.print_headline: Thai Voters Endorse Constitution That Would Extend Military’s Influence
